attributes.action: To make the selling of Croc shoes unlawful
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They are the most hideous and disgusting item to be ever thought of in the footwear world. They belittle our kingdom and humanity as a whole.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
